name: Box Shooter (Kirthika P)
description:
2 levels as of right now.

Controls: WASD & arrow keys to move, mouse to look around, left click to shoot. Shoot the text to select it. Press Esc to free your cursor from the game.

When shot, 

  • Green boxes increase your points by 5.
  • Yellow boxes decrease your time by 3 seconds.
  • White boxes increase your time by 3 seconds.
  • Red boxes decrease your points by 10.
  • Bunnies increase your points by 20 and increase your time by 5. However, once they disappear, they don't get re-generated.

You must score a certain score within a certain time in order to beat each level.

Game music courtesy of Michigan State University and noiseforfun.com.
